interactivity.requirements: 15 Maki Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Three Afloat On One Raft " from Maki Miyamura Seen " Bad Kitty " from Haruka Hamasaki Seen " A Fair Trade " from Maki Miyamura
interactivity.to_get_this_event: See Bad Kitty and choose "A blowjob" during A Fair Trade . Visit Maki at the Porn Shop at 15 Affection.
interactivity.to_miss_this_event: Either miss Bad Kitty or choose something other than "A blowjob" during A Fair Trade . Replaced by Closed for Renovation after seeing Three Afloat On One Raft .

progression.synopsis: Sensei enters a porn shop, and immediately he is struck with a sense of deja vu, as Maki is fishing in a porn game. As her discontent with the game grows, Sensei speaks up first. He makes a funny comment, that Makoto played the very same game sequence when he and Maki first met. Few moments after, Makoto shows up and decides to ruin the fun, but the two seasoned adults poke her with witty remarks and cause her to get ashamed. After Makoto's depart, Sensei and Maki continue to discuss the various intricacies of porno games and share the enjoy of mutual understanding. Logically, it leads to both of them heading to the back door room, and their meeting had a rather fruitful outcome.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .19p1.
